mn87:3.8: evametaṁ, gahapati → evameva gahapati (bj sakideva); evametaṁ gahapati (pts1ed sakideva)
mn87:3.10: Kassa kho → kissa nu kho (bj); tassa kho (sya-all)
mn87:8.3: rathikāya rathikaṁ → rathiyāya rathiyaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn87:22.5: tvaṁ → tayā (bj); taṁ (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | maṁ → mama (sya-all, km)
mn87:29.2: ativijjha maññe → ativijjha paññāya (pts1ed); paṭivijjha paññāya (mr)
